name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of November 14, Ma Dugong, an up master on Bilibili, said that because he made a video titled "GDP ≠ Pension, Paying Attention to Jiangsu = Caring About Yourself", the relevant authorities in Jiangsu went to knock on his door in the middle of the night.
Currently, this video can still be viewed on Bilibili.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, a citizen revealed that the Wuchang Municipal Government Hall in Harbin was the first to implement a six-hour work system, and people who came to handle business at noon could only queue outside in the cold.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 13, parents in Anqiu, Shandong reported that students were suffering from widespread vomiting, diarrhea and food poisoning. The school insisted on denying that there was anything wrong with the canteen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, a state-owned enterprise in Ningde, Fujian Province, sold some of its properties at a 49% discount in order to quickly collect payments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I remind you again
Be careful when leaving comments under videos related to Xi Jinping
Don’t rush to the tower at will, as these videos are watched by someone specifically

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: One more thing, I am reminding you to cherish your account. Don’t be so unconvinced and try it out, then submit again after it is blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, under the comment section of a video of French President Macron talking to the public, netizens mocked the current situation of domestic officials.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens’ contribution
Grassroots staff talk about the current status of “rural revitalization” work
“We and the poor households are both overwhelmed by it”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Rural dormitory?
On November 14, a stamped document circulated online showed that the New Rural Area of Puge County, Liangshan, Sichuan Province, issued the "New Rural Beautiful Countryside Action Human Settlement Environment Penalty Standards", involving 14 penalty standards for kitchens, bathrooms, living rooms, bedrooms, courtyards, and access roads. The minimum fine is 3 yuan and the maximum is 20 yuan. For example, a fine of 10 yuan for not washing dishes and a fine of 20 yuan for squatting to eat, etc.
The signing unit is the New Rural Area of Puge County, Puji Town.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, the Communist Youth League Central Committee published an article that allegedly satirized Xi Jinping

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"The darkest moment for rabbit friends"
Currently, there are reports that the Korean War TV series "Shangganling" originally scheduled to be released on CCTV-1 on November 13 has been suspended.
It is suspected that due to Xi Jinping's visit to the United States, Sino-US relations are about to warm up

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 13, the Ministry of Culture and Tourism issued the "Domestic Tourism Promotion Plan", proposing to support travel agencies and star-rated hotels to expand their business scope and remove the policy barriers for state-owned enterprises and financial systems to purchase service projects in star-rated hotels (especially high-star hotels).
Cultural and tourism departments at all levels should give priority to arranging meetings, training and activities in star-rated hotels.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens continue to contribute to the current status of "rural revitalization" work

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, all comments and replies on Weibo with the character "习" will be blocked and others will not be able to see them. This includes "学" (learning) and "面试" (internship). Note: Many netizens have tested that the character "习" (learning) can be displayed when posting, but it cannot be displayed in comments and replies in the comment area. You need to use "学xi" (learning) instead.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of November 14, a fire broke out at the Communication University of China Express Station
